'''2.6.10''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on July 21, 2023.

== Changes ==
* Added Realms tabs to Java & Bedrock product pages.
* Updates to Gamertag spacing.
* Updated "Bedrock Preview" logo.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=2.6.10 (Win 10/11)|project=MCL
|23380|Launcher patch notes spell macOS incorrectly.
|23526|The Minecraft for Windows game selection drop-down menu is untranslatable.
|otherissuescount=3}}
;Other
* Various accessibility and UI fixes, improvements & updates.
* Bug fix to partially address "failed to create profile" bug; if you're running into this, ensure you're logged in to the Launcher and the Microsoft Store with the same account.
* Fix to "Third-party licenses" page in Launcher.</onlyinclude>
